name: The Astrein Rain
description:
Summary

Welcome to the village of Astrein, ruled by Tebbe Ravès. Normally, there is nothing much of note happening in Astrein (well other than the occasional magical shenanigan). Sadly that statement is no longer true, Tebbe has just passed under mysterious circumstances.

Play from the perspective of Tebbe’s close friend and magical advisor, Landry, as you seek to find out what happened. Will you solve the mystery? Or will the storm that’s brewing stop everything in its tracks?  

Content Advisory: This game includes small amounts of mild language and mentions of death.

***

This Visual Novel was made for Jamtober 2018 and is not completed yet: some characters are missing and the implementation could be further improved. However, we hope you'll like it anyway! :)

*CREDITS*

Plot and Writing: eglantine

Music: Kelly Macbeth

Character Sprites: ParagonEarth

Backgrounds and Programming: Primrose
